channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Microsoft Events RSAConference 2024
item.description:
Join us at the Microsoft Security Leaders Lounge at RSAC
Are you gearing up for RSAC 2024? As the excitement builds for this year's cybersecurity event in San Francisco, California, we at Microsoft have some exciting news to share! Whether you're a seasoned veteran or a first-time attendee, make sure to mark your calendars and join us at the Microsoft Security Leaders Lounge. We have a lineup of compelling events planned, including an executive panel on threat intelligence, discussions on AI safety, insights into Zero Trust for AI learning, and much more. These are just a few of the topics w...
